comment.author: 14170629@N08
comment._content: The skeleton in the top photo belonged to the great race horse Sysonby (1902-1906), whose body was donated to the Museum of Natural History after he died of a rare disease. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sysonby

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Flickr Commons, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
